Name: enforce_max_team_size
Description: A team must not have more than 9 members to maintain agility.

Name: enforce_min_team_size
Description: A team must have at least 3 members to be cross-functional.

Name: enforce_project_budget
Description: The total allocated budget for a project cannot be exceeded.

Name: require_active_worker_status
Description: Only workers with an 'active' status can be assigned to tasks.

Name: respect_sprint_backlog_capacity
Description: The total effort of a sprint backlog should ideally not exceed the team's velocity.

Name: require_high_feature_priority
Description: Features with a priority lower than a defined threshold must not be planned.

Name: require_user_story_acceptance_criteria
Description: A user story must have defined acceptance criteria before it can be moved to a sprint.

Name: require_sprint_goal_definition
Description: A sprint cannot start unless a corresponding Sprint Goal is defined and linked.

Name: require_project_start_date
Description: A project cannot be planned or have resources assigned without a defined start date.

Name: prefer_experienced_scrum_master
Description: A team should preferably be supported by a Scrum Master with a high experience level.

Name: enforce_task_effort_limit
Description: A single task should not exceed a maximum effort (e.g.
IsSum: 16 hours) to ensure it can be completed quickly.

Name: require_feature_documentation_link
Description: A feature is not considered complete until its documentation is created and linked.

Name: prevent_work_on_closed_projects
Description: No new user stories or tasks can be assigned to a project with the status 'closed'.
